mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA(qnano, memno, qnatitle, qnainfo) VALUES qnano = #{qnano}, memno = #{memno}, qnatitle = #{qnatitle}, qnainfo = #{qnainfo}
mapper.select: SELECT qnano, memno, qnatitle, qnainfo FROM QNA ORDER BY qnano ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET qnatitle=#{qnatitle}, qnainfo=#{qnainfo} WHERE qnano=#{qnano}
